allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: Tournament scheduler with match results tracking

Features:
- Tournament schedule generation with TIME_BOXED algorithm
- Match results entry with scores and winners
- Real-time standings and rankings
- Excel export with complete results and statistics
- JSON export/import for data portability
- Auto-save every 10 minutes \(Excel format\)
- Session persistence with browser warnings
- PDF and CSV export options
- Active session detection and protection

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
